snippet.title: Space Tales | Southeast Asia Games Onward 2024 Cut Trailer
snippet.description:
Space Tales is a real-time strategy game set in a retro-futuristic environment. Take on the role of a commander in the Intergalactic Planetary Expansion (I.P.E.) and immerse yourself in a thrilling mission to explore and conquer new planets, pushing the boundaries of the Human Empire. 

Twitter : x.com/SDS_SpaceTales
Steam : store.steampowered.com/app/2457960/Space_Tales/
